testcase.name: user can login with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given Go to login page......................................................passed When User fill valid data and click login...................................passed And user click on catalog...................................................passed And user click on item......................................................passed And user find product and click on edit.....................................passed And user change the price...................................................passed And user click save.........................................................passed Then price should save and navigate to catlog page..........................passed And price at grid updated with new value....................................passed
